title: 大神发微博，4.0不远了！
author: a624535537
txt_content:
Posted Today, 04:24 PM 

They're having issues but they did attempt to submit so that means update is ready,just waiting for more info on what went wrong when trying to submit,should be worked out by today I guess so expect update next week,check out johans Twitter,he's working on beds now btw 
大意是说那家伙提交的时候发现了些问题，今天内会解决...新版本大概下星期出现

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
PE还做床了，不错
当时玩B1.3之前，没床就是痛苦，造房子都要瞎了

replies.author: plonnolq
replies.txt_content:
终于要出了
来自：Minecraft中文论坛 Android客户端

replies.author: Raven940309
replies.txt_content: 这次更新总算是不慢...上次0.3.0到0.3.2花了好几个月才更新那么点内容...

replies.author: Raven940309
replies.txt_content:
最希望更新的内容:
削弱迷雾(削弱就可以了...那个mod几乎把迷雾都去掉了,搞得我的渣机卡的和幻灯片似的)
增加床
增加储物箱(多人模式必备...生存模式必备...内饰党必备...)
